name: Procedural Terrain Generation (scientist859)
description:
I followed the guidelines and videos of Sebastian Lague and made a terrain generator. 

I've added a First Person Controller so that people (mostly me) can enjoy walking around in this environment.

There are  2 different terrain types, with flat shading and without flat shading.

WASD and Mouse to move around, hold SHIFT to move faster.

Hope you enjoy!
